doc:
William Preston (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Preston_(actor) 0 William Preston (August 26, 1921 – July 10, 1998) did not start his acting career until he was at the age of 47 but subsequently appeared in more than sixty productions of Shakespeare's plays. He had a Master's degree in English literature from Penn State. He is perhaps best known for his role as recurring character Carl "Oldy" Olson on Late Night with Conan O'Brien. Among his many movie roles, he played John, the bum, from The Fisher King (1991), a blacksmith in Far and Away (1992), and the flask mourner in Family Business (1989). He later appeared in Waterworld (1995), Reckless (1995), Blue in the Face (1995), and The Crucible (1996). William_Preston ( August_26_,_1921 – July_10_,_1998 ) did_not_start his_acting_career until he was at the_age of 47 but subsequently_appeared in more_than_sixty_productions of Shakespeare 's_plays . He had a_Master 's_degree in English_literature from Penn_State . He is_perhaps_best_known for his_role as recurring character_Carl_"_Oldy_"_Olson on Late_Night with Conan_O'Brien . Among his_many_movie_roles , he played John , the_bum , from The_Fisher_King_(_1991_) , a_blacksmith in Far and Away_(_1992_) , and the_flask_mourner in Family_Business_(_1989_) . He later appeared in Waterworld_(_1995_) , Reckless_(_1995_) , Blue in the_Face_(_1995_) , and The_Crucible_(_1996_) .
